pages.text: Mutant Monsters adds terrifying, mutated versions of your favorite mobs to Minecraft. $(br2)Encounter new, powerful bosses that will challenge even the most experienced players.
Each mutant mob has unique abilities and attacks. $(br2)Beware the Mutant Creeper's explosion, the Mutant Zombie's ground smash, and the Mutant Skeleton's deadly arrows!
Defeat these monsters for valuable rewards, like the Creeper Shard or the Mutant Skeleton's rib. $(br2)Use these items to craft powerful weapons and gear.
